attributes.action: Government to investigate Holiday Prices during School Holidays?
attributes.additional_details:
If nations happiness is to improve and families are to become the centre of our social make up than I ask the Government to carryout a full review/investigation into Holiday Industry pricing.

Why when demand is higher for Holidays in school holidays prices go up? Most business models are based on when demand is high, prices go down?

Government needs to investigate pricing and also ask whether taxation needs to be reviewed so UK families can enjoy more time together..
